text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus mitis is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 2 to 3 centimetres (0.8 to 1.2 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus mitis has been found growing on wood in Maine, Michigan, and California, during the months of July and December.
